title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.47 - Posters for public employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.47 - Posters for public employees

State Regulations
(a) Each employer shall post and keep posted in each establishment a poster
providing information relating to the job safety and health protection afforded
to public employees by the provisions of Labor Law, section 27-a. T hese
posters may be obtained from the New York State Department of Labor, Division
of Safety and Health. A poster for each establishment shall be posted in a
conspicuous place or places where notices to employees of that establishment
are customarily posted, and the employer shall take steps to insure that the
posters are not altered, defaced, or covered by other material. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.47

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
